cu.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an invalid enum 'invalid_level' will cause logging configuration errors and potential startup failures due to unrecognized log level.

du.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an invalid enum 'invalid_level' will cause logging configuration errors and potential startup failures due to unrecognized log level.
du.explanation_zh: 將硬體日誌等級設定為無效的枚舉值 'invalid_level'，會導致日誌配置錯誤，並可能因無法識別的日誌等級而造成啟動失敗。
